title: Entertainment Live: Simpsons character comes out as gay - BBC News
summary: long-serving simpsons character comes out as gay .
dolly parton and katy perry collaborate .
beatles ' abbey road recordings recreated at albert hall .
ant and dec not embarrassed by saturday night takeaway glitch .

documents.title: goodbye
text: that 's just about it from us for today , but we 're back tomorrow morning at 08:30 bst for tuesday 's live page .
in case you miss us ( and why would n't you ?
you 're only human ) here 's a couple of things to keep you going .
first up - we 've got a brand new trailer for independence day : resurgence - the follow up to the 1996 original , which is due to be released in june .
will smith is n't back for the new one but bill pullman and jeff goldblum are , alongside liam hemsworth and maika monroe .
a new trailer has been released , which you can watch below :
and because we 're extremely kind people , we 've got one final treat for you .
it 's a teaser for the upcoming kiss rocks vegas concert film , which was shot during the band 's 2014 las vegas hard rock cafe residency .
the film is being screened on one night only ( 25 may ) at cinemas around the uk .
here 's what you can expect :
time to plaster on the make-up and crack open the old records in preparation .
see you tomorrow !

documents.title: tom odell new album details
text: tom odell has revealed details of a new album and tour dates in april .
the album wrong crowd is out on 10 june and is his first since his debut long way down topped the charts three years ago .
odell was named winner of the brits critics choice award in 2013 and was longlisted for the bbc sound poll in the same year .

but all of the winners will be included in tonight 's unedited broadcast of the ceremony .
if you ca n't wait until then you can always check out our full winners list .

documents.title: favreau gives 'jungle book ' a girl-power makeover
text: jon favreau , who directs the new live-action remake of the jungle book , has said he felt disney 's original film , released in 1967 , was gender biased .
he thinks the animated adaption of rudyard kipling 's tale of an orphan raised by wolves had a distinct lack of the female characters .
the actor and director has set about putting things right by bringing on board scarlett johansson to give villainous snake kaa a more feminine touch .
i liked the character of this mother figure who is welcoming and also menacing .
i thought that there was something interesting psychologically about that .
i thought ( the original film ) was a little gender biased .
i have two daughters , and the world is different now .
the ( new ) jungle book hits cinemas in april and stars american newcomer neel sethi , 12 , as mowgli , alongside lupita nyong'o as the she-wolf raksha .

documents.title: baaba maal becomes art
text: hello , is it baaba maal you 're looking for ?
like lionel richie before him , the senegalese star has been sculpted in clay for his new music video , gilli man , which premieres today .
the project was the brainchild of director nate campion , who commissioned three artists to draw , paint and sculpt baaba maal - giving each a single day to create their artwork .
i 've always wanted to make a video where we document art being created but in a way that feels flowing , magical and cinematic .

baaba 's spiritual sound felt like the right coupling for that idea [ and ] as we went along and explored , we discovered subtle visual connections between each scene and it felt like each piece of art was connected and driven by the music .
the song is taken from maal 's 11th album , the traveller , which was released earlier this year .
he 'll perform tracks from the record at glastonbury and the bst festival in hyde park later this year .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: your reaction : the durrells , home fires and undercover
text: earlier , we mentioned last night being a huge night for new tv shows .
the durrells starring keeley hawes kicked off on itv and a new series of home fires went head to head with bbc one 's undercover starring sophie okonedo and adrian lester .
the shows were neck and neck in the ratings with average audiences of 5.2 million but undercover just edged ahead with an audience share of 24.1 % over home fires ' 23.7 % .
we asked what you thought of them and it 's safe to say most of you wo n't be leaving the house on sunday evenings for some time :

the band also confirmed the tour , which starts in may , will be named pigs can fly ( hence the promo above ) .
it 's been more than a decade since charlie simpson , matt willis and james bourne toured together as a trio .
more than 100,000 concert tickets were sold in the first hour of their release back in november .

documents.title: katherine kelly cast in doctor who spin-off
text: the cast for the new doctor who spin-off show class has been revealed and it will see katherine kelly ( ex corrie , mr selfridge , the night manager and happy valley ) as the teacher at coal hill school and new talent greg austin , fady elsayed , sophie hopkins and vivian oparah as pupils at the school .
the bbc three show has been created and written by award-winning young adult author patrick ness and has steven moffat as executive producer .
there 's nothing more exciting than meeting stars that nobody 's heard of yet .
we had the read through of the first few episodes last week , and there was a whole row of them .
coal hill school has been part of doctor who since the very first shoot in 1963 , but this new show is anything but history .
class is dark and sexy and right now .
i 've always wondered if there could be a british buffy - it 's taken the brilliant patrick ness to figure out how to make it happen . ''
the series is due later this year .
this is the premise of the show :
coal hill school has been a part of the doctor who universe since the very beginning , but that has come at a price .
all the time travelling over the years has caused the very walls of space and time to become thin .
there 's something pressing in on the other side , something waiting for its chance to kill everyone and everything , to bring us all into shadow .
fear is coming , tragedy is coming , war is coming .
prepare yourselves , class is coming .

documents.title: taylor swift thanks boyfriend 'adam '
text: taylor swift was the big winner at the iheartradio radio awards in the us last night .
she won won four awards and thanked boyfriend calvin harris , or adam , which in case you did n't know is his real name .
`` for the first time , i had the most amazing person to come home to when the spotlight went out and when the crowds were all gone , '' she told the crowd .
`` so i want to thank my boyfriend adam for that . ''
calvin harris , whose full name is adam wiles , up dance artist of the year .
one of her best friends selena gomez took home the `` biggest triple threat '' award as a singer , dancer and actor .
bono and the edge from u2 accepted the show 's innovator award and other winners included fetty wap , pitbull , chris brown and justin bieber .
bieber won male artist of the year and shared in the dance song of the year award with diplo and skrillex for where are u now .
he thanked his fans for standing by him through what he described as `` tough times '' .
`` it 's just about our growth and learning , '' he said .
read more .

enjoy :

documents.title: the simpsons ' waylon smithers comes out as gay
text: in case you missed it over the weekend the simpsons ' waylon smithers jr has come out as gay after 27 years in the closet .
the show was aired on tv in the states last night and it apparently came about thanks to the son of one of the show 's writers .
rob lazebnik , who is also a co-executive producer on the long-running animated series , has a 21-year-old son named johnny , who is gay .
`` i thought 'what better way to tell my son i love him than to write a cartoon about it ? '' '
the 53-year-old told the new york post .
johnny added : `` the revelation that my father loves me is not much of a revelation , thankfully .
he 's unbelievably accepting . ''

documents.title: zayn breaks us chart record
text: last week , former one direction member zayn malik topped the uk album chart with his first solo record mind of mine .
well , now he 's repeated that success across the atlantic , going straight in at number one in the us billboard 200 albums chart .
zayn , who performed at the iheartradio awards last night ( shifted 157,000 combined copies of his album in the us last week to reach the top spot .
in doing so , he has become the first british solo artist to go straight in at number one with his debut album .
you may well be thinking , like us , `` hang on , what about sam smith , or ed sheeran ? ''
but sam smith 's debut album , despite its considerable us chart success , only peaked at number two .
ed sheeran , meanwhile , did reach the top spot in america , but only with his second album , not his debut .

documents.title: dame judi dench gives her view on tom hiddleston as bond
text: backstage at last night 's olivier awards it was inevitable that dame judi dench would be asked if tom hiddleston would make a good james bond .
`` i would have thought so , '' replied the actress formerly known as m , pointing out that she and the night manager star had been in tv series cranford ( 2009 ) but had n't seen each other since .
the role of 007 was a difficult one to take on , she added .
i was there for pierce 's first day and daniel 's first day - and you see the whites of their eyes .
it 's a huge mantle to take on but you 're very well looked after .

documents.title: olivier winner denise gough is having the time of her life
text: the now olivier award winning actress denise gough told me earlier this year how she had almost given up acting in 2015 and had applied to be a cleaner .
now her career is going stellar with her role as a recovering addict in the national theatre 's people , places and things .
`` i 'm having the time of my life , '' said the irish actress on stage at the olivier awards last night .
gough used the main part of her speech to draw attention to the lack of diversity in her category , praising the work of actresses noma dumezweni , marianne jean-baptiste and sharon d clarke .
backstage , she elaborated :
when people are giving storming performances like that it needs to be recognised .
we need things to change .
i felt that the oscars was a really great opportunity .
if every winner had said one thing it brings massive awareness .
i asked gough how she was finding the play now it had transferred to the wyndham 's theatre in the west end .
when i look out it 's the most diverse audience i 've ever seen in the west end .
and it 's the youngest .
coming up the red carpet there was a line of young girls and boys shouting about our play - that makes me feel tops . ''
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: new spider-man title hints at possible avengers cameos
text: sound the spidey speculation siren , but it looks like we have a title for sony 's upcoming spider-man reboot .
and it 's spider-man homecoming .
the studio registered the web-slinging web domain name spidermanhomecomingthemovie.com late last week .
but can we glean anything from this possible title reveal ?
well , in the 1980s , the spider-man comic book storyline homecoming also featured appearances from characters like captain america and iron man .
chris evans and robert downey jr , who play the pair on screen , have hinted they 'll be doing something together in atlanta , georgia , soonish .
and that 's where the new spider-man film will be filmed in a few months time .

plus marvel studios head kevin feige has said the deal struck between sony and marvel not only allows spidey to make an appearance in disney 's cinematic universe ( he 'll pop up in this month 's captain america : civil war ) , but also allowed other marvel characters to appear in the sony spider-man films .
the idea of the cap and tony stark appearing in homecoming is sure to get fans ' spider senses tingling !
the new spider-man film which stars brit tom holland as a high school-aged peter parker will be released in 2017 .
author: Lizo Mzimba
Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: the durrells and undercover new tv hits

it proved a hit with an audience of 6.4 million and a share of 29 % and received a lot of love on twitter .
the durrells was followed on itv by a new series of home fires while over on bbc there was the start of new thriller undercover starring sophie okonedo and adrian lester .
they were neck and neck in the ratings with average audiences of 5.2 million but undercover just edged ahead with an audience share of 24.1 % over home fires ' 23.7 % .

documents.title: radio 1 's big weekend 2016 sells out in one hour
text: if you 've been listening to radio 1 lately it probably wo n't have escaped your notice that the station 's annual music festival is on the way .
radio 1 's big weekend is being held in exeter this year , and 50,000 tickets were released at 08:00 gmt during nick grimshaw 's breakfast show .
they were snapped up in just over an hour , with music fans in exeter , teignbridge and the surrounding areas being given priority .
the two-day event takes place at powderham castle on saturday 28 and sunday 29 may .

the lucky ticket-holders will enjoy performances from the likes of coldplay , ellie goulding , the 1975 , chase and status , bring me the horizon jake bugg and craig david ( we hope he 's playing on the saturday because he chills on sunday ) .
read more .

documents.title: welsh reveals inspiration for begbie book
text: he spent the whole of trainspotting simmering away , his quick temper and fondness for a fight making him a terrifying character to be around , but it seems francis begbie might have met his match in his creator irvine welsh 's new book .
the blade artist sees begbie reinvented as a successful artist in california , thanks to a prison art therapy course , but his past and his enemies are catching up with him .
at a manchester literature festival talk last night , welsh revealed the book came from reviving the character in a christmas short story for the big issue .
`` i started thinking 'what if begbie was the least violent character in the room ? '
and the idea grew from there , '' he said .
the edinburgh author also spoke about writing screenplays , saying `` writing your own scripts is a bit like necrophilia .
once the books done , you want to move on and do something fresh '' .
and he revealed that he sees the big screen adaptations of his works as a `` win-win '' because if the film 's rubbish , `` you say it 's nothing to do with me '' .
much like begbie would if you found him walking away from the scene of a fight .

documents.title: tulisa banned from driving for 15 months
text: tulisa contostavlos has been banned from driving for 15 months after pleading guilty at highbury corner magistrates ' court to drink driving .
the singer and former x factor judge was charged after crashing a ferrari outside southgate tube station on 10 september last year .
read more .

documents.title: olivier 's red carpet gossip
text: also causing excitement at the olivier awards were game of thrones star kit harington aka jon snow and rose leslie aka ygritte .
it seems the two are a couple and this was their first red carpet together .
others on the red carpet grabbing attention for looking pretty darn hot were james norton , currently starring on stage in bug and gemma arterton whose nell gwynn won best new comedy .

documents.title: breakingtulisa pleads guilty to drink-driving
text: former x factor judge tulisa contostavlos has pleaded guilty to drink-driving .
she was charged after crashing a ferrari outside southgate tube station on 10 september last year .
she appeared at highbury corner magistrates ' court this morning .

documents.title: beatles ' abbey road recordings recreated at royal albert hall
text: a new show , featuring up to 45 musicians , which recreates some of the beatles most famous recordings at the abbey road studios in london , premiered at the royal albert hall on friday night .

the sessions : a live restaging of the beatles at abbey road studios is based on a book by the beatles former studio engineer geoff emerick , who worked on their early recordings as a teenage assistant and went on to produce albums like revolver and the white album alongside the late sir george martin .

four actors portray paul mccartney , john lennon , ringo starr and george harrison whilst projections on screens surrounding the recreated studio two at abbey road display recording details and archive footage .

the beatles stopped touring after they recorded revolver in 1966 so , for fans , it 's the first chance to hear songs like tomorrow never knows and for the benefit of mr kite performed as they were recorded .
following the show , geoff told the bbc :
when they tried to perform some of the revolver songs they could n't , so that 's when they said they were never going to tour again .
when we recorded [ sgt ] pepper , they said 'we 're going to make sounds that we do n't have to reproduce live on stage so we can do what we like ' .
now of course , we can but then , we could n't .
paul [ mccartney ] does a lot of the songs on his shows now but only with a four-piece band but it 's not like this , there 's 45 people making the sound of four people .
the show will now tour the uk and some european countries .
author: Kev Geoghegan
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: jeremy corbyn to play glastonbury
text: who are you most looking forward to seeing at glastonbury this year ?
a ) adele
b ) muse
c ) coldplay
d ) the leader of her majesty 's opposition
the last answer may look a little out-of-place , but it 's true - labour leader jeremy corbyn has apparently been invited to take part in this year 's glastonbury .
do n't worry , he wo n't be singing a cover of wonderwall ( we assume ) , instead he will be speaking on the left field stage , after accepting an invitation from billy bragg .
we hope mr corbyn is packing his wellies .
read more .
author: Daily Mirror

documents.title: dame judi record breaker
text: it was a big night in the theatrical world last night - the olivier awards saw dame judi dench win a record eighth award up best supporting actress for her performance as paulina in kenneth branagh theatre company 's production of the winter 's tale .
no-one has won as many oliviers for acting since the awards began 40 years ago .
mark gatiss up the male equivalent for his role in three days in the country .
the best actor prize went to kenneth cranham in florian zeller 's the father , while denise gough won best actress for her acclaimed performance as a recovering addict in people , places and things .

hosted by michael ball , the ceremony took place at london 's royal opera house and included a performance by singer cyndi lauper , whose kinky boots was named best new musical - and matt henry won for lead actor in a musical .
the musical gypsy won the most awards on the night for a single production .
its four prizes included best actress in a musical for runaway favourite imelda staunton , and best musical revival .
imelda staunton and matt henry had fun in the winners room .
other winners included in the heights , hangmen and nell gwynn .
read more .

documents.title: dolly parton and katy perry team up for acm
text: first things first .
how awesome are these outfits :
dolly parton and katy perry teamed up to perform a medley at last night 's academy of country music awards .
coat of many colors , jolene and nine to five all featured in the performance - which is well worth watching if you 're a fan of brightly-coloured dresses .
chris stapleton cleaned up at the ceremony - winning four of the five awards he was nominated for .
acms 2016 : winners list
author: Rolling Stone magazine

text: we 'd love to hear from you - do get in touch if you have anything to say about any of our stories or anything else in the world of entertainment and arts - tweet @ bbcnewsents or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .

Entertainment Reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to monday 's live page .
did you have a good weekend ?
if your name is judi dench then the answer to that question is probably yes .
dame judi broke the record for the most olivier award wins in history on sunday evening .
we 'll be bringing you more on that plus a round-up of all of today 's entertainment news throughout the day .
stay with us ( and put the kettle on ) .
author: Steven McIntosh
Entertainment Reporter
